website_summaries.verdict: The Game Capture HD60 is an easy way to stream and record gameplay in 1080p video at 60 frames per second.
pros: Flashback Recording feature buffers video so you can save it later

customer_reviews.title: HD60 pro. Perfe
customer_reviews.text: This is for the HD60 pro. I bought this to live stream consoles than for pc gameplay (obs is fine for doing that). This is absolutely perfect for my needs. I stream at 1080 60 and do very little YouTube so 4k60 Pro is pointless to get. Im able to capture both PS3 and PS4 with very little troubles ( splitter for PS3). The card also automatically changes resolution when playing on the PS3 which games run at 720. Just to add there is no latency unlike the usb capture cards so setup is super easy.
customer_reviews.author: |PocketRave|

customer_reviews.title: Very disapointed.
customer_reviews.text: Had problems with audio at beginning but now it won't work at all, bought early for a present and to late to send back, otherwise I would, my son is so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: sinead walsh

customer_reviews.title: Caution if wanting to use with mobile/ tablet
customer_reviews.text: It was billed as an easy setup. I know my way around a computer but for the life of me, I couldn’t get it working as advertised. 60fps... more like 15. Was trying to use to capture iPad Air 2 game footage. But terrible audio (if I could get any at all! And really poor frame rate). Perhaps on pc/ console it works a treat. But was not fit for my purpose. Maybe with another 20 leads and connections it may have worked.... but not one for me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is Brilliantly Designed And Works Amazingly.
customer_reviews.text: This Item Is One Off The Top Capture Cards Today. It is Brilliantly Designed And Works Amazingly. Pros Pocket Friendly Its Can Record At 1080p 60 Fps Its Can Record PC,Xbox 360,Xbox One,PS3.PS4 And Many More. It Comes With Software Also Comes With A HDMI Come's With Play Back Recording Cons: The Software Is Not Very Good (I am Sure It Will Get Better) It Is Not Very Good For Recording PC You Will Need A Higher End PC To Run It On PC Overall This Product Is Amazing For Consoles But Not So Good With PC Software Is A Bit Of A Disappointment (I am Sure It Will Get Better) Great For You Tubers Starting Out.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I'm trying to start up a youtube channel and wanted to capture my PC gameplay infull 1080p to provide good content, this was just what I needed to do so. If you don't like the game capture software that Elgato provides, you can always use OBS and set this as it's capture device instead. Works an absolute treat and is easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Conor Tomlin

customer_reviews.title: As a livestreamer this is the best product for a quality livestream at 1080p I have ...
customer_reviews.text: As a livestreamer this is the best product for a quality livestream at 1080p I have one thing with this though that i hate! it promotes 0 Latency "instant game view" which is a blatant lie there is about a 20-30ms delay which is noticeable so if you wish to play directly off the elgato software then this product is not for you i use OBS and stream at 1080p downscaled to 720p and it looks great so yes i recommend this but its not perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Gittoes

customer_reviews.title: Please someone help! DO NOT BUY UNTIL THIS ISSUE IS FIXED
customer_reviews.text: I was waiting until I got my new computer to use this product and for some reason this product makes my computer crash I know it is this product because everything else has worked completely fine until I plug this in played a few games and it just crashed whilst recording. I also can't get it to detect sound on my computer. anyone who knows anything about this or please do sellers get in contact with me I would like to know what to do to fix this and for that reason I'm going to give it a 1 star rating just because it crashes my PC and is unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Records brilliantly with my ps2
customer_reviews.text: Essential tool for streamers who wan't to grow their channel or social side. Records brilliantly with my ps2. Yet to try it with other devices. Easy enough to setup, the Elgato is the perfect essential to record games from older consoles, or the newest consoles. It's worth buying. Packaging was excellent and arrived well in time.
customer_reviews.author: SarahB

customer_reviews.title: Great little device
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I've been using this to do gameplay of the switch console and have a video on my YouTUbe channel setting it up at Peace&Cookies>(^_^)< if you're interested! I'm excited to try it out with other compatible consoles too! Thanks! I say it's worth the coin!
customer_reviews.author: Gen

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product. Good for those who are starting out ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Good for those who are starting out streaming/recording and for more advanced users. The quality of the build and software is brilliant. It produces an amazingly sharp 1080p picture at 60fps. The software is simple and easy to use making recording possible at the click of a button. It also records in the background without you pressing the rec button so you never miss any action.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Turner

customer_reviews.title: Driver does not work properly with new 1803 windows update.. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: Recent windows update 1803 messed up the driver, so can’t use it to test until its sorter. Elgato should have been in the know about this to make sure new consumers who buy this will be able to use and enjoy it... Waiting on elgato to potentially release a fix, until then 2 stars!
customer_reviews.author: MAXIMUS testing

customer_reviews.title: Easy-peasy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to stream PS4 gameplay and not only that I've been able to stream PC gameplay and record from both. Easy to set up, just download the software, plug everything and go. It's a little box of broadcast magic.
customer_reviews.author: Mat Fox

customer_reviews.title: WOW ! What a great product (5 Stars *****)
customer_reviews.text: Having tried 2 other Game/Content Capture devices in the past 2 weeks - this one finally ticks all the boxes for my purposes (Capturing/Recording content from my TV Set-Top boxes) The Software that comes with the product (Download) works brilliantly and produces output that matches the original content both FPS and in HD 1080p quality where available. It is easy to use and has the added features of converting the output files to various formats. Plug and Play as it states. A bit pricey compared to others on the market, but definitely worth the extra for me. Great product !!!!
customer_reviews.author: H. Sprenkel

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT for Twitch!
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT for when you're twitch streaming!! The included software (download) is also surprisingly good. *DOES NOT WORK WITH PS3 .. PS3 has HDMI HDCP which is not able to be turned off like PS4 does.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Device not found
customer_reviews.text: Frustratingly doesnt work, kept getting device not found, waste of time
customer_reviews.author: Mr. R. F. Hingley

customer_reviews.title: Great for streaming
customer_reviews.text: Great for streaming. The product it self does exactly what it is intended for. Although if you plan on streaming and using stuff on your desktop you may need to invest in something like a mixer or the Elgato chat link. Don't know sure for myself since I need to buy one of the two.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you use the second gen Ryzen
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine when I used a i5 4690k processor in a seperate streaming pc. But after I upgraded to the Ryzen 2700x audio get gradually delayed no mater what setting I have used. Searching the internet, aparently this has been a common problem for Elgato and Ryzen but it is not being put forward or really done anything to solve. It is really a gamble if it will work with your ryzen system or not. A really nice card when using intel aparently only.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best game capture device!!
customer_reviews.text: It's been 1 year on since I've had this Elgato HD60 and it's definitely the best gaming capture device I've used. The quality is great at 1080p and of course the 60fps (as in the products name), but it also allows you to stream to twitch easily. The editing software and interface works really well for what you pay. I really would recommend this product. Feel free to ask questions too.
customer_reviews.author: Naicheervan

customer_reviews.title: Great, I think.
customer_reviews.text: No clue what I am doing, but this does what it is supposed to, just need to master bringing all the elements together to produce a decent stream.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: A Really Good Product!
customer_reviews.text: A fantastic help to bring recorded game play to life!! perfect size, really easy to set up, instructions are very easy to follow and a really good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: IS NOT PLUG IN AND PLAY
customer_reviews.text: This game capture card does not work immediately and after having many errors and fixes which I had to spend hours searching on the internet for solutions. Elgato themselves provided very little help. The bottom line is this capture card does NOT WORK on a lot of pc's and is not a simple plug in and play. Will not be buying from Elgato again and will be finding a capture card from another company.
customer_reviews.author: Davide

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Capture card
customer_reviews.text: Awesome Capture card, Use it to see my switch screen in windows so j don't have to Switch HDMI + also use to stream. Bit pricey but also quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. J. M. A. Jones

customer_reviews.title: however I will be using this more after I get a new PC but until then I would say it's only worth 3-4 stars because of the PC po
customer_reviews.text: It works well, however it does require a decent computer, my laptop struggles to use it without stuttering so I am only giving it 3 stars, however I will be using this more after I get a new PC but until then I would say it's only worth 3-4 stars because of the PC power required to run this easily
customer_reviews.author: Kieran B.

customer_reviews.title: does the job
customer_reviews.text: captures from my A7iii and works nicely with OBS to livestream nicely, does what it says on the tin no worries.
customer_reviews.author: andrew king

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful paired with my iPad Pro for a YouTube project
customer_reviews.text: This was an incredibly easy piece of kit to install. I use it with an iPad Pro and the AV adaptor. I am so impressed with how well it works for my purposes. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Dejonwo

customer_reviews.title: The Best Game Capture System Available!
customer_reviews.text: Before I picked this up I owned the Hauppauge HD PVR and this is a dream to use by comparison! Why, you ask? 1. No plug! You don't need a separate socket to plug this into, unlike the Hauppauge! 2. It's tiny! My Hauppauge took up a large amount of space aside my consoles, but i can plug this in when I need it and pack it in a drawer when I'm done! 3. Awesome software! I work on both Mac & PC and Elgato make their own software for both, and it's extremely easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Aidan Williams

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Cannot recommend this product at all as every time I change something in my PC, it seems to cause a new problem with this capture card that remains a "mystery" to Elgato's technical support. From stuttering to software crashes to just poor performance. The only reason it gets 2 stars is because when it HAS worked, it has been a very good product, but as I said, it's hard to recommend a product that hasn't worked for 90% of the time I've owned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Set up isn't easy and Elgato's support service isn't great
customer_reviews.text: Great kit, once you (finally) set it all up. We had issues with lagging, sound etc etc. It also requires a few software downloads too. I'd also suggest their helpline that provided better coverage....for the UK they don't come online until 4pm....I eventually opted for web help, but they took days to come back (and we'd eventually fixed everything by going on the web and getting help from other users on forums).
customer_reviews.author: Marsha F.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Installed in my streaming rig, does the job perfectly and handles the stream and encoding with No issues Tech support from elgato via twitter is 5 stat
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: brilliant
customer_reviews.text: a great device that worked very well delivery good and quality of elgato was fantastic
customer_reviews.author: dickie

customer_reviews.title: Well well well
customer_reviews.text: Fine for recording, very good quality. But when watching it back it’s so laggy and doesn’t time up with the audio on footage
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Good bit of kit
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I've been using it to stream using xsplit and i gotta say im loving the sharpness and the lag is very minimal!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome work of gadget
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome work of gadget! Highly distinctive product as the contour of the Elgato HD is smooth and shaped like a pill. Used for gaming my 'not to be mention' games and the resolution is fantastic! You can livestream your online or offline game within the YouTube when recorded. Having to say that, it is brilliant Elgato HD game recorder!
customer_reviews.author: Arafat Shan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy to use only downside is it needs power ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to use only downside is it needs power to run which means you have to have the laptop on all the time that sucks,
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Happy!
customer_reviews.text: El garo HD60 Pro is a great tool for recording gameplay and such. But is a monumental pain in the rear to set up correctly
customer_reviews.author: Dominic Ormston

customer_reviews.title: has been abit of a pain but there are cheap and easy work arounds
customer_reviews.text: Works a treat! Even though I've had a few problems with the HDMI copyright protocol (not its acutall name), has been abit of a pain but there are cheap and easy work arounds. Software is full of features that are usefull and productive and preview features to sound check your audio. And is small and compact and only needs a HDMI cables to work.
customer_reviews.author: William Williams

customer_reviews.title: All in one
customer_reviews.text: A great little all in one set up, works with most streaming platforms & provides a good little software package for those new to it.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas M.

customer_reviews.title: HD60 Elgato Game Capture Card
customer_reviews.text: The HD60 Game Capture Card is Extremely good recording Card. The Finished Gameplay Footage is Superb. I’m extremely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mr M J B

customer_reviews.title: great little device
customer_reviews.text: Great little device! Works like a charm but the only downside I would say is, when I'm just gaming generally with out recoding software open, that the screen will black out for a second, happens like once every hour or so, nothing major bad but can stress me out when I'm in a boss battle
customer_reviews.author: Guvi Takhar

customer_reviews.title: make sure you have a good computer
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product. All I would say is to make sure your pc/laptop meets the requirements, preferably higher than the minimum. On the elgato website it says the minimum requirements are 2ghz processor 4gb of ram My laptop has a 2.16 ghz processor and 4gb of ram (3.89gb usuable). I have experienced many problems using this, but I know it's due to my computer and the reason I know this is because I won't have any problems if the elgato software is the only software open. If i had many things open, then I would have problems.
customer_reviews.author: michael ward

customer_reviews.title: a good buy
customer_reviews.text: my son is a gamer and loves this, it works well on the PS4 and PS3, we haven't had any issues. took a bit of time to set up but we figured it out in the end. A good purchase for the bedroom gamer to learn more about posting games etc
customer_reviews.author: buying it all on Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant product - recommend
customer_reviews.text: A lot better then the previous generation and comes with a good software, great for picking up screen recordings on PC as well as all of the listed devices, would recommend for you to buy as it is the best one on the current market
customer_reviews.author: Julian Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great for twitch and youtube
customer_reviews.text: Use this to stream on twitch i have had no problems with this it takes a while to get use to the way to work the program but once you get the hang of it this can be amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Scott

customer_reviews.title: OBS users may have problems! Xsplit works best so far with this
customer_reviews.text: Was a little awkward to make this work with OBS streaming software but got there in the end! The built-in software is rather good and currently it works best with Xsplit until OBS works better with it. Great results can be had with this card!
customer_reviews.author: C. Jarvis

customer_reviews.title: Next gen only!!!
customer_reviews.text: Does not work with older xbox 360 consoles due to audio cable supplied fits only next gen consoles. Unable to obtain the correct cables as no longer available. Have a very upset son
customer_reviews.author: Vivienne

customer_reviews.title: dose not work without a mixerr
customer_reviews.text: bought as i was told easy to use and setup only to finding out you need to have a mixer so i will be returning for a full refund as this is compleately useless to me and i cannot afford another £200 for a mixer
customer_reviews.author: Lone

customer_reviews.title: Perfect capture card.
customer_reviews.text: The best capture card for recording gameplay! Even if its streaming or even recording for YouTube, It's quite expensive but its top of the range so its definitely worth it! The programme is easy to work as well.
customer_reviews.author: Lucas Rigby

customer_reviews.title: Great capture card
customer_reviews.text: It is a great product, works well as advertised, I manage to stream at a beautiful 1080p60fps resolution and that's it. I had a couple of bumps along the way but the company's tech support were very nice, fast and helped me with my inquiries. Recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: grjkie

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly.. BUUUT!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly, apart from you have to have the computer your console is plugged into switched on even just to watch youtube or on demand.
customer_reviews.author: VJ

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This capture card is expensive compared to other cards. On the other hand, the quality of the videos are simply amazing. Installation is very simple and operation of the software is easy as well. Bare in mind that the software does need an above average computer or laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Kacper W. Jurczak

customer_reviews.title: Best capture device for consoles.
customer_reviews.text: Great product and been a fan since the first one was released, but not compatible with the PS3 anymore as with the older version. Regarding the recent Windows 10 upgrade, there have been several issues with the Elgato freezing during recording. Apparently they are working on this issue, but in the meantime you can improve things by lowering some of the quality settings and disabling the preview window
customer_reviews.author: Fuzz

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: It's kinda off bad the video quality was bad time to time it used to come up with blue screen
customer_reviews.author: Yathu

customer_reviews.title: Elgato
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and setup to any gaming rig for streaming or recording, easy to use, easy to setup.
customer_reviews.author: Ieuan Bendall

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but you get what you pay for. I can't fault it.
customer_reviews.author: Charline Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Just works
customer_reviews.text: Plugged it into my motherboards pcie x1 slot. Installed the software from the website and pumped the video input to obs 👍
customer_reviews.author: CarlB

customer_reviews.title: apparently its the best thing since sliced bread!
customer_reviews.text: for Christmas I bought this for my 11 year old son with a desk top PC...hes already uploading videos to youtube from his Xbox one and having the time of his life...santa actually got it spot on for a change :-)
customer_reviews.author: Steam cleaning queen

customer_reviews.title: Good for 60fps capture
customer_reviews.text: Good for 60fps capture. Can be used with other software such as amarecTV (good recording program) when directshow drivers are used (Kept low key, but available through search)
customer_reviews.author: siukbuyer

customer_reviews.title: from better picture quality to the software just doing everything you ...
customer_reviews.text: Solid capture card, switched from an Avermedia Live Gamer HD which did the job. This goes above and beyond, from better picture quality to the software just doing everything you want it to with awesome support from Elgato.
customer_reviews.author: dakaiez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 40+ hours of streaming and it works great. Does what it suppose to do.
customer_reviews.author: Andrei S.

customer_reviews.title: Really easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to set up ; I highly recommend it but please don't buy it and write a bad review if you have a bad experience because thata down to the processing power of your pc and if you look online there are ways to fix any lagging or pixel acting which I used however I bought a better pc anyways as I had been planning on building a gaming pc which handles the software on the best graphic settings and I have to say the footage is just amazing the graphic quality and audio quality are way more than what I expected
customer_reviews.author: Wayne mason

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a friend, and he is using it already, really good quality and arrived really fast
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only someone with a tech degree could work this.
customer_reviews.text: It’s just doesn’t work! The software is terrible. After a month of trying to record, still no joy because either there’s no sound, or the playback is glitchy, or randomly in double speed. Not user friendly at all. Please don’t bother unless you have a degree in something tech related.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Helen Green

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works well with my Gaming PC and Xbox One, however there is some input lag with the Xbox One
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B

customer_reviews.title: Not for Windows 10 users
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a Christmas Present for my son. It does not work to well with windows 10 which he has on his laptop. Tried if on my Wife's Laptop which is windows 7 and it works ok
customer_reviews.author: Pj

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, if anyone is having difficulties at 1080P go to XBOX settings, display and select 720P. The jittery picture preview will stop.
customer_reviews.author: Atif Iqbal

customer_reviews.title: amazing product
customer_reviews.text: just an amazing product, i needed this to record my games in 1080p and it does its job very well. would recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: mcallan chiz

customer_reviews.title: Happy son
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son who absolutely loves it. I'm not sure what it does, but apparently it does it well. My son also paid for it and at the age of 14, he hasn't complained.
customer_reviews.author: C J R

customer_reviews.title: Faulty
customer_reviews.text: Thought there was a fault with one of the wires, after trying different ones, turns out they just sent a faulty item
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: A must have for console gaming channels
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use for both PS4 and Xbox One. Superb quality recording (video and audio) Pick up the Elgato gaming chat link cable as well for crisp party chat recording as the two work really well together. Lots of YouTube tutorials for this peice of kit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for recording games
customer_reviews.text: No lag 60fps 1080p easy to install can withstand high temputures got it for speed runing mario oddysy
customer_reviews.author: Tim Webb

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product overall recommended
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking at one of these for a while after having the roxio game capture HD being a simple device, The Elgato software is easier to use and the Capture the capture device is self explanatory to set up, Great quality gaming clips during recording and from archive footage recommended this to all my friends and they are happy to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Shadw_Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Got what I paid for, works perfectly and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Rayman167

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, The software that comes with it is ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, The software that comes with it is very good, however, i use a different editing software so i haven't used all of the features it comes with (not because they aren't good, just i have never had need of using them, so i can't review them for you i'm afraid!). But!! A sturdy and sleak design paired with an easy set up and faultless functioning doesn't really go wrong. Ticked all the boxes for me and for that reason I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: HoneyComb

customer_reviews.title: Superb!
customer_reviews.text: Just superb - had a few setup issues initially but resolved these and it works great for recording and streaming games - captures full HD quality visuals and sound superbly
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Instructions could be better. had problems getting it to work with PS4
customer_reviews.text: Instructions could be better. had problems getting it to work with PS4. Now found some online instructions on how to disable some feature on the PS4 to get it to work. So will see later today
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Capture Card For All
customer_reviews.text: Great Capture Card for people who don't know a lot about the inner workings of a pc also this does work on windows 7 but you have to download the later version of the game capture program that it uses and not the newer one
customer_reviews.author: overdrive04

customer_reviews.title: Recommend to YouTubers
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. I had already got a product from Elgato for recording game-play videos and I loved that but this is just a clear step up from all of its competitors products. Would highly recommend to anybody starting a YouTube channel.
customer_reviews.author: Callum Andrew aston

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 13 year old son who is a computer nerd as I say ( meaning he is brilliant on them) and he is chuffed with it .
customer_reviews.author: EMMA S.

customer_reviews.title: 5* Would recommend to everyone
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a 1st time capture device for my PS4 and I was going to get the game capture HD until I saw the new HD60. I decided to take the plunge and I must say for the extra cost the HD60 is well worth it... the image quality is amazing the 1080p @ 60fps really brings your recordings back as if you were playing them again. That coupled with the elgato software makes basic editing, uploading to YouTube and streaming to Twitch a breeze. Would definitely recommend to any next gen gamer
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Expect a lot more for the price - BUYER BEWARE!!
customer_reviews.text: An absolute nightmare to install BUYER BEWARE, you must be prepared to spend hours sorting out all the glitches and software issues. No instructions with the product other than direction to the Elgato website to download their software. I had to source you tube on how to install and sort the glitches out. The product is not ready for the mass market yet.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work with Mac that well
customer_reviews.text: Great little item for it's money worth only thing is it don't say in the advertising box is that it don't work that well with Mac. As you can see in the photo it breaks the gameplay while streaming, bit annoying finding that out after buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my fiancé. Works like a charm. Might get me one as well. Videos look amazing. No lag, no shitte quality. Clever little toy.
customer_reviews.author: Andy N.

customer_reviews.title: Great for starting youtube.
customer_reviews.text: Everything works great, came with all the components specified In the description and no damages to report. Not to complicated to set up I just had to look up a simple guide on youtube and it works fine. Highly recommended to kick off a gaming channel on youtube. It came a day late but it also came with a another product which came early so all in all nothing bad.
customer_reviews.author: harry nunn

customer_reviews.title: but great for HD game capture to upload on YouTube or ...
customer_reviews.text: Pricey! but great for HD game capture to upload on YouTube or stream on Xbox/PLaystation
customer_reviews.author: urbanbanter

customer_reviews.title: ... to record SkyQ programs to my laptop with this wonderful piece of equipment having been unsuccessful in trying to ...
customer_reviews.text: I was able to record SkyQ programs to my laptop with this wonderful piece of equipment having been unsuccessful in trying to download SkyQ to my DVD player.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and simple!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely essential for starting your own YouTube channel. This bit of kit could not be any easier to use, it is literally plug in and play. It is worth every penny of the £139 i paid

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use software which you have to download (elgato

customer_reviews.title: but once set up it was perfect.
customer_reviews.text: It works straight out of the box with an X box 360 and will apparently also work with PS4. But I bought this for my son to use with a PS3. Had to buy an additional HDMI splitter (1 input 2 output) to enable it to work, but once set up it was perfect.

product_meta.title: Elgato Game Capture HD60 - Next Generation Gameplay Sharing for Playstation 4, Xbox One & Xbox 360, 1080p Quality with 60 fps
product_meta.description:
Style:Game Capture HD60

ELGATO GAME CAPTURE HD60
NEXT GENERATION GAMEPLAY SHARING
The gaming experience is all about sharing. With Elgato Game Capture HD60, the next generation of gameplay sharing has finally arrived. Record and stream your PlayStation 4, Xbox One and Xbox 360, or Wii U gameplay and share your journey with friends, fans and generations to come.

Seamlessly capture hours of your best moments in stunning 1080p with 60 fps and access them directly on your PC or Mac. With Flashback Recording, you don't have to worry about your capture - simply slide back in time on your PC or Mac and hit the record button retroactively.

The lag-free passthrough to your TV will let you focus on your game, until you're ready to marvel at your feats. The built-in Live Streaming feature gets you up and running on Twitch, YouTube or Ustream in a snap. With Stream Command, easily add your webcam and overlays, and change your stream layout on-the-fly with scenes. Add your voice with the built-in Live Commentary feature, and you're all set for the big show.

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS
 * Input: PlayStation 4, Xbox One & Xbox 360, Wii U (unencrypted HDMI)
 * Output: HDMI (pass-through)
 * Interface: USB 2.0
 * Supported resolutions: 1080p60, 1080p30, 1080i, 720p60, 720p30, 576p, 576i, 480p
 * Dimensions: 4.4 x 3 x 0.75 in
 * Weight: 3.7 oz

NOTE : In addition to requiring Mac OS X 10.9 or higher, an “Intel Core i5 CPU (2nd gen)” is also required.
feature_bullets: Record your Xbox, PlayStation, or Nintendo gameplay
Unlimited capture right to your PC or Mac
One-click sharing to YouTube, Facebook and Twitter
Stream Command: add webcam and overlays
Product includes: Elgato Game Capture HD60, USB cable, and HDMI cable

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars2,327 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
